label: ham
subject:
svn commit: samba r22710 - in branches: SAMBA_3_0/source/nsswitch
	SAMBA_3_0_26/source/nsswitch
body: This was the conclusion at which I was seeking to arrive when I said that painting or drawing, and imitation in general, when doing their own proper work, are far removed from truth, and the companions and friends and associates of a principle within us which is equally removed from reason, and that they have no true or healthy aim.
